## Hello! I Am Ramakrishnan

I am a Research Associate at **FSR Global**, working on energy transitions for the Global South.  
My current work focuses on **Resource Adequacy** in power systems and **energy literacy** among young people, using Natural Language Processing (NLP).

## What I Work On

- Preparing a two-part techno-policy **handbook on power sector Resource Adequacy**
- Researching **energy literacy among adolescents** in the European Union and beyond (Erasmus+ project)
- Guest lecturing on **Resource Adequacy** at the **Energy Transition Academy**
- Bringing together **data, storytelling, and policy** from my experience as a data analyst with Datarivu
